imdb.plot outline: In this series, we met Tibi a beautiful smart and clever girl and her friend Pisi a funny cat, they traveling together, and fight with problems and they learn new lesson from them adventures. The series location is a Istanbul. The story is based on the two main characters and what's going to happen in each episode. They maintain their friendships at any situation and come together to resolve their problems. Any of them may do some mistakes but can finally remove it.
imdb.title: Tibi ile Pisi
plot: In this series, we met Tibi a beautiful smart and clever girl and her friend Pisi a funny cat, they traveling together, and fight with problems and they learn new lesson from them adventures. The series location is a Istanbul. The story is based on the two main characters and what's going to happen in each episode. They maintain their friendships at any situation and come together to resolve their problems. Any of them may do some mistakes but can finally remove it.::Arezu Tanta
